API¶

Logger¶

Title : Logger Description : Defines class logger, which implements a custom logger. Author : Bernardo Paulsen Version : 1.0.0

class logger.Logger(name: str, file: str = 'log.log', level: int = 10, mode: str = 'a', format: str = '%(asctime)s:%(name)s:%(levelname)s:%(message)s')¶

Class which implements a custom logger.

Parameters

  • name (str) – Logger name

  • file (str, optional) – Log file name, defaults to “log.log”

  • level (int, optional) – Log level, defaults to logging.DEBUG

  • mode – Log file mode, defaults to “a”

  • format (str, optional) – Log format, defaults to “%(asctime)s:%(name)s:%(levelname)s:%(message)s”

Tupe mode

str, optional

config(name: str, file: str = 'log.log', level: int = 0, mode: str = 'w', format: str = '%(asctime)s:%(name)s:%(levelname)s:%(message)s')¶

Configures logger.

Parameters

  • name (str) – Logger name

  • file (str) – Log file name

  • level (int) – Log level

  • mode – Log file mode

  • format (str) – Log format

Tupe mode

str

Returns

Logger

Return type

logging.Logger

console_handler(level: int, formatter: logging.Formatter)¶

Configures console handler.

Parameters

  • level (int) – Log level

  • formatter (logging.Formatter) – Formatter

Returns

Console handler

Return type

logging.StreamHandler

file_handler(file: str, mode: str, level: int, formatter: logging.Formatter)¶

Configures file handler.

Parameters

  • file (str) – Log file name

  • mode (str) – Log mode

  • level (int) – Log level

  • formatter (logging.Formatter) – Formatter

Returns

File handler

Return type

logging.FileHandler

formatter(format: str)¶

Configures formatter.

Parameters

format (str) – Log format

Database¶

Title : Database Description : Defines class Database, which uses SQLite3 to manage a database file. Author : Bernardo Paulsen Version : 1.0.0

class database.Database(name: str = 'test.db', table: str = 'test', log_name: str = 'database', log_file: str = 'log.log')¶

Class which connects to and edits database using SQLite3.

Parameters

  • name (str, optional) – Name of database file, defaults to “test.db”

  • table (str, optional) – Name of table in database, defaults to “test”

  • log_name (str, optional) – Logger name, defaults to “database”

  • log_file (str, optional) – Log file name, defaults to “log.log”

config()¶

Connects to database, drops table if it exists and creates new table.

get_create()¶

Returns script used to create table.

get_drop()¶

Returns scrip used to drop table.

get_insert()¶

Returns script used to insert data into table.

insert(date: str, title: str)¶

Inserts values into database.

Parameters

  • date (str) – Article date

  • title (str) – Article title

Webdriver¶

Title : Webdriver Description : Defines class Webdriver, which uses selenium to connect to, navigate and collect data from the internet. Author : Bernardo Paulsen Version : 1.0.0

class webdriver.Webdriver(path: str = '/Users/bernardopaulsen/chromedriver', options: str = '--headless', log_name: str = 'webdriver', log_file: str = 'log.log')¶

Class which uses selenium to connect to, navigate and collect data from the internet.

Parameters

  • path (str, optional) – chromedriver path, defaults to “/Users/bernardopaulsen/chromedriver”

  • options (str, optional) – webdriver options, defaults to “–headless”

  • log_name (str, optional) – Logger name, defaults to “webdriver”

  • log_file (str, optional) – Log file name, defaults to “log.log”

config(path: str, options: str) → selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver¶

Configures Chrome webdriver.

Parameters

  • path (str) – chromedriver path

  • options (str) – webdriver options

get(url: str)¶

Gets url.

Parameters

url (str) – Url to connect to in webdriver

get_elements(xpath: str) → list¶

Gets all elements given xpath expression.

Parameters

xpath (str) – Xpath expression for elements

Returns

Elements which match xpath expression,

Return type

list

get_inner(xpath: str, element: selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement.WebElement) → selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement.WebElement¶

Gets element which is inside given element.

Parameters

  • xpath (str) – Xpath expression for element

  • element (WebElement) – Element from which to search for inner element.

Returns

Inner element

Return type

WebElement

next_page(xpath: str)¶

Clicks next page element.

Parameters

xpath (str) – Xpath expression for next page element

Scraper¶

Title : Scraper Description : Defines abstract class Scraper, which scrapes news websites. Author : Bernardo Paulsen Version : 1.0.0

class scraper.Scraper(start_url: str, next_xpath: str, row_xpath: str, title_xpath: str, date_xpath: str, n_pages: int = 2000, n_last: int = 100, log_name: str = 'scraper', log_file: str = 'log.log', db_name: str = 'test.db', db_table: str = 'test')¶

Class for scraping news websites.

Parameters

  • start_ulr – Main webpage from which to start scrapping

  • next_xpath (str) – Xpath expression for next page element

  • row_xpath (str) – Xpath expression for news elements

  • title_xpath (str) – Xpath expression for title element inside news element

  • date_xpath (str) – Xpath expression for data element inside news element

  • n_pages (int, optional) – Number of pages to scrap, defaults to 2000

  • n_last (int, optional) – Number of (last) news elements to inspect when looking for previously unscrapped news after next page click, defaults to 100

  • log_name (str, optional) – Logger name, defaults to “sraper”

  • log_file (str, optional) – Log file name, defaults to “log.log”

  • db_name (str, optional) – Database file name, defaults to “test.db”

  • db_table (str, optional) – Database table name, defaults to “test”

abstract static get_date(date: str)¶

Abstract method. Gets date string and formats it to DATETIME data type (SQLite3).

Parameters

date (str) – Date string.

get_info(element: selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement.WebElement)¶

Extacts information from elements and inserts it in the database.

Parameters

element (selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement.WebElement) – Article element containing information

loop_elements(new_elements: list)¶

Loops through elements, finds new article elements, gets their information and inserts the information in the database.

Parameters

new_elements (list) – List of new article elements which will be looped by in search of article elements not yet found.

run()¶

Runs web scrapping.

Minas¶

Title : Minas Description : Defines class Minas, child of Scraper, which scrapes the political section of Estado de Minas website. Author : Bernardo Paulsen Version : 1.0.0

class minas.Minas(start_url: str = 'https://www.em.com.br/politica/', next_xpath: str = "//*[@id='em-read-more']", row_xpath: str = "//div[@class='news-box free pb-10 mb-20' and position()>last()-200]", title_xpath: str = ".//a[@class='txt-gray']", date_xpath: str = './/small', n_pages: int = 2000, n_last: int = 200, log_name: str = 'scraper', log_file: str = 'test.log', db_name: str = 'test.db', db_table: str = 'minas')¶

Class, child of Scraper, which scrapes the political section of Estado de Minas website.

Parameters

  • start_ulr – Main webpage from which to start scrapping, defaults to “https://www.em.com.br/politica/”

  • next_xpath (str, optional) – Xpath expression for next page element, defaults to “//*[@id=’em-read-more’]”

  • row_xpath (str, optional) – Xpath expression for news elements, defaults to “//div[@class=’news-box free pb-10 mb-20’ and position()>last()-200]”

  • title_xpath (str, optional) – Xpath expression for title element inside news element, defaults to “.//a[@class=’txt-gray’]”

  • date_xpath (str, optional) – Xpath expression for data element inside news element, defaults to “.//small”

  • n_pages (int, optional) – Number of pages to scrap, defaults to 2000

  • n_last (int, optional) – Number of (last) news elements to inspect when looking for previously unscrapped news after next page click, defaults to 200

  • log_name (str, optional) – Logger name, defaults to “sraper”

  • log_file (str, optional) – Log file name, defaults to “log.log”

  • db_name (str, optional) – Database file name, defaults to “test.db”

  • db_table (str, optional) – Database table name, defaults to “minas”

static get_date(date: str)¶

Gets date string and formats it to DATETIME data type (SQLite3).

Parameters

date (str) – Date string

Returns

Formatted date

Return type

str
